about_the_game:
2080 Apocalypse

2080 Apocalypse is a combination of action-adventure, mystery, 3d platforming puzzle game. In this semi-open world, You have must fight with dead robots and bring a master cube. beautiful adventure with dead robots.

STORY

You are going to get an emotional, mystery full story in this game where you have to play the character of a robot who is going to the surface of the earth for the first time. and he faces new problems making friends and enemies.

FEATURES

you have to Unlock yourself Upgrade yourself for going forward in-game there are 3 types of different guns and bullets, you have to collect bullets, crystal, health bar.
you can unblock yourself by using crystal and power Up yourself for a better health bar and immunity.

LEVELS

in this semi-open world, you have to face five different types of surfaces on the earth in which you have to run, hide, fight for your master
